text: @GOPChairwoman @realDonaldTrump Dumbest statement ever!! No new jobs were Created. People who were layed off due to the coronavirus epidemic in the food industry went back to work. It's as simple as that. When the unemployment rate gets back to 3.5%  then you can brag.
